title: Gâteau Saint Honoré
description: Named in honour of the French patron saint of bakers and pastry chefs, this stunning French choux pastry-based dessert pulls out all the stops. This version is garnished unusually with roses and twigs.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a piping bag, a 1cm/½in plain nozzle, a small plain nozzle and a 23cm/9in metal chefs' ring.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz butter, cut into small pieces, plus extra for greasing
